attributes.action: Encourage companies or business to turn off their lights at night!
attributes.additional_details:
In my opinion I consider it a waste when I know that some shops leave their lights on of a night time and even in the day time it happens too. The other day I was in an indoor shopping centre near me and they had lights on which was completely unncessary because it was in the middle of the daytime and already well lit.

Companies and businesses should be constantly encouraged to reduce energy use.
